triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are core enablers of AI Agents for task-specific automation and reasoning capabilities.

triples.name: Generative artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Generative AI is positioned as the precursor foundation that enables AI Agents.

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: A key technique for enhancing AI Agent capabilities through structured instruction design.

triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: RAG is proposed as a targeted solution to address hallucination challenges in AI systems.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Foundational concept for understanding autonomous agents that perceive environments and take actions.

triples.name: Reasoning model
triples.relevance: ReAct loops combine explicit reasoning traces with action execution for enhanced agent capabilities.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Central to Agentic AI characterized by multi-agent collaboration and coordinated autonomy.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: A key challenge examined in both AI Agents and Agentic AI paradigms requiring solutions.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Foundational field enabling the natural language understanding and generation in AI systems.

triples.name: Causal model
triples.relevance: Proposed as a solution to improve robustness and explainability in AI-driven systems.

triples.name: Customer support
triples.relevance: A key application domain where AI Agents demonstrate task-specific automation capabilities.

triples.name: Scheduling (computing)
triples.relevance: An application domain enabled by AI Agents for automated task scheduling and planning.

triples.name: Automatic summarization
triples.relevance: A data summarization task domain enabled by AI Agents for content processing.

triples.name: Robotic automation software
triples.relevance: Related to Agentic AI deployment in robotic coordination and autonomous process execution.

triples.name: Clinical decision support system
triples.relevance: An application domain for Agentic AI in medical decision support systems.
